summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to civil service; combining the staff of the Civil Service Commission and Public Safety Civil Service Commission and amending sections 4.04.250, 4.08.050, and 4.08.070 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
committee_vote: 8 (Bagshaw, Burgess, Clark, Godden, Harrell, Licata, O'Brien, Rasmussen) - 0
